checkersPlayer
Class HAL1000S

java.lang.Object
  checkersPlayer.HAL900
      checkersPlayer.HAL1000
          checkersPlayer.HAL1000S
All Implemented Interfaces:
CheckersPlayerInterface
public class HAL1000S
extends HAL1000

The HAL1000S is an advanced learning Artificial Intelligence for Checkers. It uses a depth-limited search and a mini-max algorithm with alpha-beta pruning. It uses a neural network to evaluate the board. The HAL1000S is a reduced version of the HAL1000 that moves within a few seconds.

Version:
"1.13 - 26 September 2008"
Author:
Amos Yuen and Louis Wang
